statements: SELECT debtor_id, credit_score, income_information FROM debtor_information;
SELECT credit_score, debtor_id, income_information FROM debtor_information;
SELECT income_information, debtor_id, credit_score FROM debtor_information;
SELECT credit_score FROM debtor_information WHERE debtor_id = 100;
SELECT debtor_id, income_information FROM debtor_information WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT debtor_id, credit_score, income_information FROM debtor_information WHERE debtor_id = 123;
SELECT debtor_id, credit_score FROM debtor_information WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT credit_score, debtor_id, income_information FROM debtor_information ORDER BY credit_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM debtor_information WHERE income_information->>'salary' >= '50000';
SELECT AVG(credit_score) AS average_credit_score FROM debtor_information;
SELECT * FROM debtors WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT full_name, credit_score FROM debtors WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT * FROM external_data WHERE income < 30000 ORDER BY credit_score DESC;
SELECT full_name, income FROM debtors WHERE credit_score BETWEEN 600 AND 800;
SELECT * FROM external_data WHERE source = 'credit agency';
SELECT debtor_id, full_name, credit_score, income FROM debtors WHERE credit_score > 700 ORDER BY full_name ASC
SELECT * FROM debtors INNER JOIN external_data ON debtors.debtor_id = external_data.debtor_id WHERE debtors.income > 50000 ORDER BY external_data.credit_score DESC
SELECT full_name, income, credit_score FROM debtors WHERE income < 40000 ORDER BY credit_score ASC
SELECT debtor_id, full_name, income FROM debtors WHERE credit_score < 600 ORDER BY debtor_id DESC
SELECT * FROM debtors LEFT JOIN external_data ON debtors.debtor_id = external_data.debtor_id WHERE external_data.source = 'Bank' ORDER BY debtors.full_name ASC
SELECT id, credit_score, debtor_name FROM CreditScores;
SELECT * FROM IncomeInformation WHERE debtor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT debtor_name, credit_score FROM CreditScores ORDER BY credit_score DESC;
SELECT debtor_name, income FROM IncomeInformation WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT * FROM RepaymentCapacity WHERE credit_score > 700 AND income > 60000;
SELECT debtor_name, credit_score FROM CreditScores WHERE credit_score > 700 ORDER BY credit_score DESC;
SELECT debtor_name, income FROM IncomeInformation WHERE income > 50000 ORDER BY income ASC;
SELECT c.debtor_name, r.repayment_capacity FROM RepaymentCapacity r JOIN CreditScores c ON r.credit_score = c.credit_score WHERE r.income > 60000 ORDER BY r.repayment_capacity DESC;

SELECT c.debtor_name, i.income, r.repayment_capacity FROM CreditScores c JOIN IncomeInformation i ON c.debtor_name = i.debtor_name JOIN RepaymentCapacity r ON c.credit_score = r.credit_score WHERE i.income > 40000 AND r.repayment_capacity > 30000 ORDER BY i.income DESC, r.repayment_capacity DESC;

SELECT c.debtor_name, r.repayment_capacity FROM CreditScores c JOIN RepaymentCapacity r ON c.credit_score = r.credit_score WHERE c.credit_score > 600 AND r.repayment_capacity > 50000 ORDER BY c.credit_score ASC;
SELECT * FROM credit_score LIMIT 10
SELECT debtor_id,score FROM credit_score ORDER BY score DESC
SELECT debtor_id,annual_income,income_source FROM income_information WHERE annual_income > 50000
SELECT debtor_id,payment_date,amount_paid FROM repayment_history ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT debtor_id,max_debt_allowed,interest_rate FROM debt_capacity WHERE interest_rate < 0.1
SELECT * FROM credit_score WHERE score > 700 ORDER BY debtor_id DESC
SELECT debtor_id, annual_income, income_source FROM income_information WHERE annual_income > 50000 AND income_source = 'Salary' ORDER BY annual_income DESC
SELECT debtor_id, payment_date, amount_paid FROM repayment_history WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY payment_date ASC
SELECT debtor_id, max_debt_allowed, interest_rate FROM debt_capacity WHERE max_debt_allowed < 100000 OR interest_rate > 0.1 ORDER BY debtor_id

SELECT repayment_history.debtor_id, repayment_history.amount_paid, credit_score.score FROM repayment_history JOIN credit_score ON repayment_history.debtor_id = credit_score.debtor_id AND repayment_history.amount_paid > 5000 ORDER BY repayment_history.amount_paid DESC
SELECT * FROM DebtorInformation;
SELECT debtor_id, credit_score FROM CreditScores WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT debtor_id, income, capacity FROM IncomeInformation JOIN RepaymentCapacity ON IncomeInformation.debtor_id = RepaymentCapacity.debtor_id;
SELECT name, debt_amount, repayment_date FROM DebtorInformation JOIN DebtDetails ON DebtorInformation.debtor_id = DebtDetails.debtor_id;
SELECT debtor_id, MAX(credit_score) AS max_credit_score FROM CreditScores GROUP BY debtor_id ORDER BY max_credit_score DESC;
SELECT name, address FROM DebtorInformation WHERE debtor_id = 1;
SELECT debtor_id, income FROM IncomeInformation WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT debtor_id, debt_amount, repayment_date FROM DebtDetails ORDER BY repayment_date DESC;
SELECT debtor_id, credit_score FROM CreditScores WHERE credit_score >= 700;
SELECT debtor_id, capacity FROM RepaymentCapacity WHERE capacity IN ('Good', 'Excellent');
